about_the_game:
Welcome to a peaceful world where the rhythm of the day and night, the whisper of the wind, and the gentle shift of seasons invite you to slow down, relax, and explore. Survive. Collect. Adapt. In this tranquil 2D platformer, your journey is as much about the beauty of nature as it is about navigating the challenges that arise with each passing day.

Feel the comforting embrace of the changing weather and the serenity of the environment as you gather resources, craft items, and slowly make your way through a world that seems to breathe with you.

Take a step into a world where time moves slowly, where the elements are kind, and where each day holds a new chance for peaceful discovery. Whether you're watching the snow gently fall, collecting resources, or simply exploring at your own pace, the world is yours to enjoy. Relax, breathe, and let the world embrace you.

Will you take your time to experience the beauty of the world? The journey is yours to make.

Key Features

  • Day and Night System

  • Weather System: Rain / Snow / Sunny / Night Ambiance

  • Seasonal Changes

    • Winter: Icy platforms, cold-related mechanics.

    • Summer: Heat, dry surfaces, certain plants or wildlife may appear, and changes in the environment.

    • Autumn: Falling leaves, or new collectibles like fallen fruit or acorns that can be used for crafting or healing.

    • Spring: Blooming flowers, and wildlife that may be helpful or pose a threat.

  • Enemy Variety: Different enemy types for each season or weather type (e.g., ice creatures in winter, fiery monsters in summer).

  • Healing Items: Collectible food, first-aid kits, or potions to heal during your escape or after combat.

  • Escape and Explore at Your Own Pace: While there are moments of urgency, the overall experience is one of gentle exploration. Seek out peaceful pathways, find quiet hideaways, and take in the sights and sounds of nature. Escape doesn’t feel rushed—it's about finding balance, making the journey your own, and enjoying every step along the way.

  • Soothing Survival Mechanics: Your survival in this world is not about harsh struggle, but gentle care. Keep an eye on your warmth, your health, and your resources, all while letting the peaceful rhythm of the world guide you. Warm yourself by a fire in winter, sip from a crystal-clear spring in spring, or relax under the shade of a tree in summer. The world provides all you need—if you listen closely.

  • Soundscapes That Relax and Immerse: The gentle sounds of nature surround you—the soft rustle of leaves in autumn, the tranquil babbling of streams in spring, the rhythmic patter of rain in winter. Every step, every action, every change in the weather is accompanied by a soothing soundscape that calms the mind and refreshes the spirit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 4 GHZ
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
